long_description:
Our recent reboot at Stanford Court Hotel brings us more inline with the innovative heart of San Francisco, applying tech-forward amenities and eco-friendly practices to our boutique hotel in Nob Hill.

We’re excited about these new additions, so we thought we’d highlight a few. Here are just some of the new tech amenities our guests at Stanford Court Hotel can look forward to. 

The Daylighted art exhibit in our lobby

We love art at Stanford Court Hotel. The digital, rotating art exhibit in our lobby is one of our most visible tech-forward installations. Curated by the SF-based company Daylighted, the rotating series features high resolution displays of contemporary, emerging or mid-career artists on digital canvases. If you like what you see, prints can be purchased direct from Daylighted, using an iPad in the lobby. 

Kinima.fit

Our rebooted fitness center at Stanford Court Hotel (which happens to have one of the best views in the city) is now outfitted with the best exercise equipment. Guests have around-the-clock access to the center’s Kinima.fit stations, which work like personal trainers. The adaptive fitness systems use 3D camera technology to track reps, effort and burned calories before customizing your next workout. Say hello to the future with your AI fitness trainer.

Electric car and motorcycle charging station & electric bikes

Charge up your ride at SCH before taking a spin around SF. Our onsite electric car and motorcycle charging station promotes the eco-friendly practices at Stanford Court. More apt for the bike lane? Our bike rental program includes use of our New Albion bikes and Blix Electric bikes, which helps with those steep uphill climbs San Francisco is famous for. Exploring the city just got cleaner.

Google Chromecast in every room

Whether it’s Hulu, Netflix, Amazon Fire, HBO Go, games, movies, or something else, each room at Stanford Court is equipped with Google Chromecast for your viewing pleasure. Want to stay in for the night and binge-watch your latest show? Not a problem.

PressReader

Staying true to our eco-friendly methods and paperless practices, PressReader is available for guests at Stanford Court Hotel. Enjoy access to a wide selection of newspapers and magazines on your smartphone or tablet. Keep up with the day’s news and leave a paperless trail, using PressReader.

-- 

Stanford Court is a boutique hotel located in Nob Hill. Close to Chinatown, Union Square, and North Beach, Stanford Court Hotel offers free bike rentals to make every part of San Francisco accessible to our guests.
title: Our Favorite Tech-Forward Amenities at Stanford Court
seo_title: Our Favorite Tech-Forward Amenities at Stanford Court
